p: In the aim of the valorization of medicinal and aromatic plants of the Moroccan and Saharein flora, we interested in this ethnobotanical study to two species frequently used by the population local for their virtues: Vitex agnus castus of the verbenaceae family, commonly called kharwaâ and the other spéce was Anabasis aretioids of the chenopodeaceae family, knowed as Shejra li maidihach errih name.
